name: Puff!
description:
A small physical puzzle.
The aim of the game is to drop the ball in the green area sequentially removing Cuba.
The difficulty is that to predict the behavior of the object is extremely difficult.

Preview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qfqq4HYIIo8&t=4s

It's Demo versions.
Full version in Steam Greenlight.

Please vote: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
